channel.title: URGENT, haven't got any help at all! client, npc expansion
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to expand the npcs list so that you can have more? my npc list only reaches to 3899. when i try to add npc models, my client gives me a black screen and i cant login. hope the moparscape community can help me. edit: this is what my run.bat says: [code]Server Powering up... Server has been launched.. Files initialized Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3899 at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:2394) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:602) at server.main(server.java:130)[/code]
any help?

item.title: URGENT, haven't got any help at all! client, npc expansion
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

At the top of most classes there is usually a bit of code that sets the array length.
Sometimes the array length is set by reading the correct length from a file, if that is the case, you just need to over-ride it.

But isn’t this a server question anyway?

Read full topic
item.source: URGENT, haven't got any help at all! client, npc expansion

Does anyone know how to expand the npcs list so that you can have more? my npc list only reaches to 3899.
when i try to add npc models, my client gives me a black screen and i cant login.
hope the moparscape community can help me.

Server Powering up... Server has been launched.. Files initialized Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3899 at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:2394) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:602) at server.main(server.java:130)
